meanings.definition: To convert into money or cash.
meanings.sent1: She was monetizing her old clothes by selling them online.
meanings.sent2: The company was monetizing its assets to raise capital for expansion.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried monetizing his tricks, but no one wanted to pay for them.
meanings.sent4: The artist was monetizing his passion for painting by selling his artwork.
meanings.sent5: Monetizing her skills as a baker, she started a successful pastry business.

meanings.sent1: He was monetizing his YouTube channel through sponsored content.
meanings.sent2: The entrepreneur was monetizing his innovative idea to attract investors.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried monetizing its nut-gathering skills, hoping to trade nuts for treats.
meanings.sent4: The farmer was monetizing his land by leasing it for agricultural purposes.
meanings.sent5: Monetizing his expertise in photography, he started a freelance business capturing special moments.
